article_title: Hospice Focused on Children to Open in Manhattan Beach
article_text:
It is one of the saddest corners of the health-care field—hospice care for children—and it has been relatively neglected. Now, a Brooklyn health-care organization hopes to change that.

MJHS, formerly known as Metropolitan Jewish Health System, plans to open what it says is the city's first residence for dying children and their families on 10 acres of property on the water in Manhattan Beach.

Beginning Monday, the 16-suite...
